meanings.definition: A dish in which small pieces of food are dipped into a hot sauce or melted cheese.
meanings.sent1: We enjoyed delicious fondues at the party, dipping bread and vegetables into the cheese sauce.
meanings.sent2: For dinner, we decided to make fondues with chocolate for dessert.
meanings.sent3: At the picnic, the fondues were so popular that everyone wanted to dip everything in the cheese!
meanings.sent4: The fondues of flavors in the sauce created a culinary masterpiece on the table.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the fondues filled the room, making everyone's mouths water.
